EmailTemplate.name: AAS Support Case Submission Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting us, we have received your request and it has been assigned case number {!Case.CaseNumber} and added to our queue to be processed.
You can click on the link - {!Case.Link} to access the case.
We look forward to chatting soon!
Salesforce AAS Support Team NCR Corporation salesforce.aasq2csupport@ncr.com
NCR Confidential. FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY. NCR Corporation 864 Spring St. NW, Atlanta, GA 30308-1007 Â©2020 NCR Corporation. All rights reserved. ncr.com NCR respects your privacy.
